alfredsnippet.snippet:
"The careful perusal of the Lecture will show the reader how, in the hands of Science and indomitable energy, results the most gigantic and absorbing may be wrought out by skilful combinations of acknowledged data and the simplest means."

- George Biddell Airy (British Astronomer Royal in the middle of the nineteenth century)
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Good Analysis Need Not Be Complex
